label: A6B28CD8_cI86_197_e_c2f_a_2c-001
title: High-Temperature Sr$_{4}$Al$_{6}$O$_{16}$S Structure
comments:
This is the high temperature structure of Sr$_{4}$Al$_{6}$O$_{16}$S.  Below $\approx 520$K it transforms into the orthorhombic \href{http://current_web_home_dir/A6B4C16D_oP108_27_abcd4e_4e_16e_e-001}{Ca$_{4}$Al$_{6}$O$_{16}$S structure}.  
 There is disorder in this structure: \begin{itemize} \item The Sr-I and Sr-II sites are 56\% and 44\% occupied, respectively.  These are the paired atoms in the diagram.  Only one site in each pair is occupied. \item The O-I (8c) site and the O-III (24f) site are 26.3\% and 24.6\% occupied.  These are the atoms around the sulfur atom.  Only four of the sixteen available oxygen sites around each sulfer atom are occupied. \end{itemize}
